dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Attention]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 22, 2005 12:11 PM
To: Dooley-1@softhome.net; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Attention]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Attention
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2005 16:26:05 -0300
From: Dooley-1 <Dooley-1@softhome.net>
Reply-To: Dooley-1 <Dooley-1@softhome.net>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

It has been recently brought to my attention by several researchers that one
of your clients is using my web title to attract visitors to your client's
website hosted by you (Theplanet.com).

Your client did not contact me to request my permission to do this.  "The
Dooley Family History" title is copyrighted to me and its connection to me
and my research has been in use by me for 23 Years "The Dooley Family
History" is well known within the research community as being the title for
"my" particular genealogical research which stems as far back as 6th century
A.D.  My books also carry the title "The Dooley Family History".

I will be seeking legal advice on this issue.  Again.. this has been my
research and internet title for more than 20 years and it is well documented
as being so both in print AND on the internet.

I am demanding that your client cease using my title "The Dooley Family
History" immediately.  Your client's website is located here
http://www.genealogy-family-tree-history.com/Dick-Doty/Dooley-Family-History
.html.

When you look at your clients website you will see in the links section that
he/she has placed a link to one of my websites but has conveniently changed
the title of my page within the link.  This is unacceptable behavior.

I wanted to contact your client directly but I could not find an email
address on his/her website.

Thank you for your time and cooperation.

John Dooley
The Dooley Family History
email: Dooley-1@Softhome.net



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCuZupvK/XpJs6oyURArj3AJoCa+EutNB5/Vew6DheE/zM3vUaIQCeM9D4
cjr7FLft21nn+b3b38P4ExM=
=59Zk
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
